'''''The White Path Between Two Rivers''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to be defeated by a Legendary [[Hunter's Ray]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This can be accomplished when fighting:
** Angelica and Medoro, Fairy Knight Twins, located northeast of the [[Pale Forgotten Glory]] domain
** Cortana and Murgleis, Swords of the Gorge, located west of [[Thalatta Submarine Canyon]].
* Only 1 character in the player's party needs to fall during the fight to obtain the achievement.
